<denchmark-h:h2>android non-free detector/descriptor segmentation fault</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Nonfree SIFT/SURF feature detector/descriptor are not availabile to android[ยน] Please make a check on java descriptor extractor compute or on the string passed to descriptor constructor because actually compute method on descriptor initialized with SIFT/SURF (opponentsift etc..) crash with a non easy debuggable segfault in android.
[1]http://answers.opencv.org/question/445/242-android-missing-nonfree-package/ </denchmark-code>
